treatment-md.title: Heteroponera ecarinata Taylor, 2015, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Australasian ants of the subfamily Heteroponerinae (Hymenoptera: Formicidae): (2) the species-group of Heteroponera relicta (Wheeler), with descriptions of nine new species and observations on morphology, biogeography and phylogeny of the genus
